name: CFTimeZoneNameStyle
desc: Index type for constants used to specify styles of time zone names.

items.name: case daylightSaving
items.desc: Specifies the daylight saving name style; for example, “Central Daylight Time” for the Central time zone.

items.name: case generic
items.desc: Specifies the generic name style, which does not distinguish between daylight saving and standard time; for example, “Central Time” for the Central time zone.

items.name: case shortDaylightSaving
items.desc: Specifies the short daylight saving name style; for example, “CDT” for the Central time zone.

items.name: case shortGeneric
items.desc: Specifies the short generic name style, which does not distinguish between daylight saving and standard time; for example, “CT” for the Central time zone.

items.name: case shortStandard
items.desc: Specifies the short standard name style; for example, “CST” for the Central time zone.

items.name: case standard
items.desc: Specifies the standard name style; for example, “Central Standard Time” for the Central time zone.
